meta.name: Political Red
meta.description: 红色政工风格，经典红金配色，适合党建学习、政策解读

base.container: background-color: #fffbf0; color: #1a1a1a; font-family: 'SimSun', 'Songti SC', serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.9; padding: 24px;

headings.h2: color: #c8102e; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin: 28px 0 18px; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 3px solid #c8102e;
headings.h3: color: #9f1239; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; margin: 22px 0 12px; padding-left: 16px; border-left: 5px solid #e63946;
headings.h1: color: #c8102e; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin: 28px 0 18px; text-align: center; padding-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 3px solid #c8102e;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #fee2e2; color: #991b1b; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 3px; font-family: 'KaiTi', serif;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #fef2f2; color: #7f1d1d; padding: 18px; border-radius: 4px; margin: 20px 0; border-left: 4px solid #c8102e; font-family: 'KaiTi', serif;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fef3c7; border-left: 4px solid #f59e0b; color: #78350f; padding: 16px 22px; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fee2e2; border-left: 4px solid #dc2626; color: #991b1b; padding: 16px 22px; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 0 4px 4px 0;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #c8102e, transparent); margin: 36px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #fef2f2; border: 2px solid #c8102e; color: #c8102e; padding: 28px; text-align: center; margin: 24px 0; font-weight: bold;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 48px; padding: 24px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #c8102e10, #e6394610); border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; border-top: 3px solid #c8102e;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
